Body:
Description: The latest version of the EndPoint Protector blocks some applications from running. In order to fix the problem, we had to add the applications that are getting blocked to "Advanced Scanning Exceptions" - Whitelist. We have had the product for a number of years and never had to do this before. Note: we are only using this for monitoring and blocking for printing - (DLP for printing). One question I have is can I turn off Device Control policies altogether, I wonder if that is what is blocking applications from running?
Thanks
Pete
